product_name: Kuhl Riot Denim Pants - Men's 30" Inseam - 2014 Closeout
long_description: With a 30-in. inseam, the Riot denim pants feature a premium combed slub-cotton fabric with a touch of spandex for stretchy comfort on your casual days at home or quick hikes into the hills.
short_description: With a 30-in. inseam, the Riot denim pants feature a premium combed slub-cotton fabric with a touch of spandex for stretchy comfort on your casual days at home or quick hikes into the hills.
